title: WaterNetwork - Curve
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic curve made for the Water Network Management domain. This entity is primarily associated with the water management vertical and related IoT applications.

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It must be equal to Curve.

xData.description: Property. X data points for the curve

yData.description: Property. Y data points for the curve

tag.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. An optional text string used to assign the curve to a category.

description.description: Property. A description of this item
